definition: dried meat/private teacher's remuneration/withered/variant of 修[xiu1]
to decorate/to embellish/to repair/to build/to write/to cultivate/to study/to take (a class)
first month of the lunar year
straight/upright/proper/main/principal/to correct/to rectify/exactly/just (at that time)/right (in that place)/(math.) positive

sentences.english: Americans continue to debate how to interpret the Second Amendment.
sentences.chinese: 美国人为如何解释第二修正案继续辩论。

sentences.english: There are two religion clauses in the First Amendment.
sentences.chinese: 《第一条修正案》里有两条关于宗教的条款。

sentences.english: Those portions superceded by amendments will not be read.
sentences.chinese: 我们不会朗读那些被修正案取代的部分。

sentences.english: There are no amendments or special exemptions.
sentences.chinese: 没有修正案和特别免罪条款。

sentences.english: The source declined to give more details on the revision.
sentences.chinese: 透露消息的人拒绝给出修正案更多的细节。

sentences.english: I welcome the amendment to the bill without qualification.
sentences.chinese: 我不带任何条件地接受这项法令的修正案。

sentences.english: An amendment isc a - hange or an addition to the constitution.
sentences.chinese: 修正案是一种修改或补充宪法的法案。

sentences.english: And in nineteen nineteen, the nation passed the eighteenth amendment to the federal constitution.
sentences.chinese: 而在一九一九年，国家通过了联邦宪法第十八修正案。

sentences.english: Germany has passed a balanced-budget constitutional amendment.
sentences.chinese: 德国已经通过了平衡预算的宪法修正案。

sentences.english: DFTT shall notify Client of the relevant amendment either in writing or through its webpage.
sentences.chinese: DFTT以书面形式或网站通知客户有关的修正案。

sentences.english: Yeah, that's exactly right, and that's why we have a constitutional amendments.
sentences.chinese: 是的，那非常正确，正是因此我们有宪法修正案。

sentences.english: The amendment was rejected by 203 to 106.
sentences.chinese: 这项修正案以203票比106票遭到否决。

sentences.english: Criminal law amendment divulges behavior in the light of the individual information with serious clue only.
sentences.chinese: 刑法修正案只针对情节严重的个人信息泄露行为。

sentences.english: So the party committed itself to a constitutional amendment to abolish slavery.
sentences.chinese: 因此，共和党致力于通过宪法修正案以废除奴隶制。

sentences.english: Others might want a balanced budget amendment.
sentences.chinese: 其他人可能想要一个平衡预算修正案。

sentences.english: The visitation right was regulated in the amendments of the marriage law.
sentences.chinese: 探望权是《婚姻法》修正案中确立的一项权力。

definition: proposal/draft resolution/motion (to be debated)/to propose a bill/to make a proposal
